About Me

Hi I am Daniel Valentin ,
I create project results based on empirical evidence, and believe that the best products are achieved when the end users are involved from ideation to testing. I always ask critical questions about processes, and strive to be innovative without always reinventing the wheel. I am a flexible and curious person who always tries to deliver results that are good and useful for my colleagues and any end users I interact with. As a person, I am empathetic, curious and trusting and appreciate the good mood in an often busy everyday life. I quickly create good relationships and am a team player who believes that the team best achieves its goals through ongoing process optimization and dialogue.

My Timeline

UX Consultant, Racing Kids · Freelance

2022 — present

Consulting and preparation of a new workflow for product import as well as general process optimization primarily in shopify.

UX/IT Consultant, Hjorths Badehotel · Freelance

2018 — 2022

IT support and process optimization tasks as well as maintenance and content for websites in wordpress.

First level support at ITSS Group Technology, Nordea

2016 — 2019

Incident and knowledge management tasks in various ERP systems. Onboarding of new team members. Close collaboration with other IT departments in Denmark, Finland, Norway, Sweden, India and many other countries. Maintain a high service level and meet SLA targets for the department.

Brand Ambassador, Gorm Larsen Nordic

2015 — 2016

Sale and presentation of various hardware, including computers, printers, VR Headsets, smart phones and more. Bookkeeping of sales and interactions in Gorm Larsen's in-house CRM system. Installation and responsibility for exhibition stands and other logistics in connection with conferences.

Webmaster, Restaurant Rusk · Freelance

2014 — 2012

Store Employee, Creative Space APS

2014 — 2015

MSc Digital Design and Interactive Technologies, IT University of Copenhagen, Denmark

2018 — 2021

The master's program in Digital Design and Interactive Technologies provides a broad understanding of digital design processes from the initial studies of the design domain to testing and implementation. In-depth knowledge of data visualization, context and user analysis is provided, as well as understanding of the role digital designs and services play in our society and culture today and in the future.

BSc Global Business Informatics, IT University of Copenhagen, Denmark

2015 — 2018

Global Business Informatics is an interdisciplinary programme with the goal of teaching students where to see new possibilities in digital technologies with respect to their application in society. With my degree in Global Business Informatics, i worked with sustainable development of IT-processes in private enterprise, public institutions, and Non-Governmental Organisations in large and small projects.
